reviewText: It's OK, but looks very old and is probably an old vhs copied to DVD. The recent American Woodturner magazine has all the same info, better presented.

This book inspired me to build an Oval Chuck. It give enough information to make an unbalanced chuck to do limited turning of Oval Boxes and Picture frames. I have Emailed David about his Lathe and the lathe I am building. IL did add a Balance system to the chuck to keep vibration down. GREAT BOOK! if you are interested in Oval turning
